Hi Rich - 

Kind of thought that email didn't leave the box...been having a=
 fit with that of late! Anyway, let's try this again. The attached is a pic=
ture from my friend in Chile, the photo I bought the stein off off. I'm hea=
ding out this weekend, but next week I'll take a better photo and post it o=
n Yahoo photos for all to see. Needless to say, I was relieved to see this =
signature pass in Chicago. I felt it had to be okay (and Jim Gilbert agreed=
 when I showed it to him in Tampa) but still, a relief.  

Ron
